summary: BodySlide Preset designed to go best with Fitness Body.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26654-1-1406130545.jpg[/img]

========================================================================================

[color=greenyellow][size=3][u][b]Currently Supporting:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49015]Calientes BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12273]Calientes Vanilla Outfits[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49711]Cubic Hair 3D[/url]

[color=greenyellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Install one of the Fitness BodySlide Presets.

2) Start BodySlide.exe, found in "Data|Caliente|Tools|BodySlide"
3) Click on "Batch Build...".
4) Make sure the right Body and/or Armors are selected: (Example below)

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/26654-1-1389040692.jpg[/img]

5) Click on "OK". (Wait untill it's done.)
6) At "Outfit/Body:" select "CalienteBodyAdvanced".
7) Click on "Create Bodies".

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=greenyellow][size=3][u][b]Breast Shadow Options:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

To get these effects follow the installation instructions on the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731]Fitness Body[/url] page and blend "More Breast Shadow (Slim)" or "Less Breast Shadow (Curvy)".

========================================================================================

[color=greenyellow][size=3][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE and Vanilla Armors[/url]
ChronoTrigger77 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259]Remodeled Armor[/url]
EliteCheat for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/49711]Cubic Hair 3D[/url]
author: Lunyra

files.name: Fitness BodySlide - A
files.changelogHtml:
- Updated for Remodeled Armor 5.0.
- Removed 100% Knee Height since no Armors support it.
- Zap Bra is now Zap Belt.
- Fixed missing Group Name in some presets.
- Removed Zap Belt & Panty combination. (resulted in Skirts being Zapped on some Armors)
